Docs.summary: Contains settings for a service such as the connection strings, host name, subscription ID, etc. The provides typed properties for known settings such as and as well as access for all other settings.
Docs.remarks: Any property values set on an instance will only stay in effect for the lifetime of the current . To change the settings in a persistent manner, please update them using a mechanism provided by the service host.
